department.dept_long_name: Division of Engineering and Applied Sciences

course.title: Computational Solid and Structural Mechanics
course.meeting_text: Tu., Th., 1–2:30 and a weekly section to be arranged.
course.description: Introduction to finite element methods for analysis of steady-state and transient problems in solid, structural, fluid mechanics, and heat transfer. Implementation of simple MATLAB codes and use of existing general-purpose programs (ABAQUS and COMSOL).
course.prerequisites: Engineering Sciences 120 or equivalent introduction to the mechanics of deformable materials and fluids. Engineering Sciences 123 may be taken concurrently.
